caption:
This photograph captures a serene cityscape viewed across a large body of water. The sky, taking up the top half of the frame, is adorned with soft, sprawling clouds tinted with shades of pink and blue, suggesting that the photo might have been taken during early morning or late evening. Below the sky, the tranquil sea stretches across the foreground with gentle ripples, reflecting the subdued light of the sky.

In the distance, a horizon line clearly separates the water from the sky. A series of high-rise buildings dominate the view, forming a continuous urban skyline. These buildings vary in height but generally have a modern architectural style, typical of mid-to-late 20th century urban developments. The city appears quiet and there are no visible signs of active movement or life from this distance.

The photo has an overall vintage look, likely due to the color saturation and quality typical of older film photography. The edges of the photo are slightly darkened, giving it a vignette effect which focuses the viewerâ€™s attention towards the center where the skyline is located. The atmosphere conveyed is peaceful and somewhat nostalgic, encapsulating a moment of calm and simplicity against the backdrop of urban growth.
title: Smog on the bight off the Long Island coast. The bight includes 15,000 square miles of ocean waters and continental shelf off the coasts of New York and New Jersey. There are indications man's activities have disturbed the delicate ecological balance which exists in the marine environment, particularly in the New York Harbor area, heavily used for commerce, recreation and waste disposal. Near New York City.
